overview: Anais, a chef making pastries in her 30s, broke up for the first time in her life, and had trouble controlling her emotions. Anais is never heartbroken! Because he is a serial-hearted man. How many of her exes are struggling to stay. But I did not think this man could make Anais heartbroken. Anais' journey to meet her ex-ex began to finish what was right.
title: Anais Patah Hati Pertama Kali
